title: The answer of a person of quality to a scandalous letter lately printed and subscribed by P.W. intituled, A letter desiring a just and merciful regard of the Roman Catholicks of Ireland
author: Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.
notes: Written by Roger Boyle, Earl of Orrery. Cf. BM; DNB.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
